name: Cash Transaction with Assignment Then Delete Test
description: Create budget, cash account, category, do transaction without initial assignment, assign money to cover overspending, then delete transaction and verify final state

steps.description: Spend $50 on groceries without prior assignment
Assign $50 to groceries to cover the overspending
Delete the transaction, leaving the assignment in place

ynabBehaviorNotes: Transaction creates overspending: assigned=0, activity=-50, available=-50
Assigning $50 covers the overspending: assigned=50, activity=-50, available=0
Deleting transaction removes activity but keeps assignment: assigned=50, activity=0, available=50
Ready to Assign remains at 950 (assignment stays in place)
Account working balance returns to original $1000 (transaction removed)
